summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3688 , for the improvement of North Broadway, from Allison Street to a connection with the existing pavement on Fuhrman Avenue, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45454 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
